```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame([('bird', 2, 2),
...                    ('mammal', 4, np.nan),
...                    ('arthropod', 8, 0),
...                    ('bird', 2, np.nan)],
...                   index=('falcon', 'horse', 'spider', 'ostrich'),
...                   columns=('species', 'legs', 'wings'))
>>> df
 species  legs  wings
falcon        bird     2    2.0
horse       mammal     4    NaN
spider   arthropod     8    0.0
ostrich       bird     2    NaN 
```

```py
>>> df.mode()
 species  legs  wings
0    bird   2.0    0.0
1     NaN   NaN    2.0 
```

```py
>>> df.mode(dropna=False)
 species  legs  wings
0    bird     2    NaN 
```

```py
>>> df.mode(axis='columns', numeric_only=True)
 0    1
falcon   2.0  NaN
horse    4.0  NaN
spider   0.0  8.0
ostrich  2.0  NaN 
```
